sentences: Isalik armastus on sügav ja pühendunud.
Direktor noomis õpilasi mõne isaliku sõnaga.
Õpetaja üritas olla isalik oma käsustamisel.
context: The word 'isale' in Estonian is the allative singular form of 'isa', which means father. In this case, it indicates movement toward or direction to a father. It can be used to express something being directed toward or intended for a father.
